Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends Object
    Controller for the Game.fxml How the players take turns according to the rules.

      • stepPossibility

        public final void stepPossibility(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                           throws TransformerException,
                                  ParserConfigurationException,
                                  IOException,
                                  SAXException
        Decides if the player on turn can choose the given circle or not. They can choose the dark ones.
        Parameters:
        event - is an action event for the button.
        Throws:
        TransformerException - if an exceptional condition occurred during the transformation process.
        ParserConfigurationException - indicates a serious configuration error.
        IOException - if it reads an xml file that has the wrong structure
        SAXException - for the XML parser

      • setMainApp

        public final void setMainApp(MainApp mainApp)
        Is called by the main application to give a reference back to itself.
        Parameters:
        mainApp - refers the main app
